items.title: ‘It feels like retaliation’: My sister is estranged from her daughter and wants to donate her inheritance. Is that weird?
items.description: “There is a new cultural trend of adult children becoming estranged from their parents.”

items.title: Today’s newborns may need $5 million or more for retirement starting in 2100
items.description: Generation Beta could face a major shortfall in savings in 75 years if things don’t change.

items.title: Ford, Rivian stocks get boost from sales after rival Tesla’s numbers fall short
items.description: Rivian and Ford shares are on the rise after both carmakers touted growth in EV sales.

items.title: Stocks will struggle under Trump if this rate keeps going higher
items.description: U.S. debt concerns and higher Treasury yields may be stumbling blocks for stocks in 2025.
